short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and useful time tracker for achievers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplest task time tracker extension possible!

Struggling to getting things done? How about start achieving your goals?
Install, add a task and hit "Start" to begin focusing and measuring your effort.

Remember: the secret to achieve great things is to take one first step!
